text: Soni Kukwakwe ni kugali makiyi ga yakusisika pangali waakugamanya ikaweje Jwalakwe, ni akuimanya yaili pankuli ni m'mbwani, soni ngalikwikaga mwakupakatika lisamba lililyose ikaweje akulimanyaga, kapena lusongolo lwalukuwa nchipi chetaka, kapena chachiwisi chilichose namuno chachijumu, ikaweje (yosope) ili mâ€™chitabu chakusalichisya (chilichose Al-Lauh-Al-Mahfuz)
